actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-553, by Mr. Linder.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 183.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 465.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 213 (Roll no. 280).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4954) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for a voluntary program for prescription drug coverage under the Medicare Program, to modernize and reform payments and the regulatory structure of the Medicare Program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 4954 (medicare modernization and prescription drug benefit).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4954) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for a voluntary program for prescription drug coverage under the Medicare Program, to modernize and reform payments and the regulatory structure of the Medicare Program, and for other purposes.
